labels.name: type: feature
labels.description: Brand new functionality, features, pages, workflows, endpoints, etc.

candidates.title: chore: Add version checks for upstream tools
fix: use container skopeo
candidates.body: the `os_version` is defaulting to the `image_tag` inside containers and causing our template to use latest tag

candidates.title: refactor: Move templates to their own crate
candidates.body: This PR logically separates out parts of the code to their own crates. As we've been adding more and more logic into the template for the Containerfile, compilation times have started to increase. This is mostly due to the fact that askama is a compilation time templating engine that uses macros to build rust code. I figured the best way to help with that was to seperate out the templating into its own crate. In order to do that while keeping the CLI as the root package, I had to also move ops, constants, and the recipe structs into their own sub-packages.

candidates.title: feat: block overriding
candidates.body:
This PR helps transition users who may not realize that we override their Containefile.

I added two Constants:
- `CONTAINER_FILE_PATH` => `./Containefile`

I am not worried about the tag name, we can always come up with something better, but let me know what yall think of the build date. I kind of like knowing when this build kicked off.

candidates.title: fix: Update containerfile to check for presence of cosign.pub
feat: Bugreport command
candidates.body: Add a bug report + completions command so that new users can easily submit bugs to us, and I wanted completions for bb (super easy with clap)

candidates.title: feat(podman-api): Clean up working container for SIGINT and SIGTERM
feat: run clippy + BlueBuildTrait
candidates.body:
- Run clippy and add clippy warnings for better code cleanness
- Condense commands to a trait and shove them into a folder together
